Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC10add.name: addMembers(keyPackages:)
Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC10add.abstract: Commit the addition of one or more members.

Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC6comm.name: commit()
Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC6comm.abstract: Perform a commit of received proposals (or an empty commit).

Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC25enc.name: encryptApplicationMessage(message:)
Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC25enc.abstract: Encrypt an application message using the current group state.

Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC10exp.name: exportTree()
Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC10exp.abstract: Export the current epoch’s ratchet tree in serialized format.

Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC22pro.name: processIncomingMessage(message:)
Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC22pro.abstract: Process an inbound message for this group.

Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC17pro.name: proposeAddMembers(keyPackages:)
Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC17pro.abstract: Propose to add one or more members to this group.

Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC20pro.name: proposeRemoveMembers(signingIdentities:)
Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC20pro.abstract: Propose to remove one or more members from this group.

Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC13rem.name: removeMembers(signingIdentities:)
Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC13rem.abstract: Propose and commit the removal of one or more members.

Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC14wri.name: writeToStorage()
Classes/Group.html#/s:5MlsRs5GroupC14wri.abstract: Write the current state of the group to storage defined by

Classes/Client.html#/s:5MlsRs6ClientC11c.name: createGroup(groupId:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:5MlsRs6ClientC11c.abstract: Create and immediately join a new group.

Classes/Client.html#/s:5MlsRs6ClientC25g.name: generateKeyPackageMessage()
Classes/Client.html#/s:5MlsRs6ClientC25g.abstract: Generate a new key package for this client.

Classes/Client.html#/s:5MlsRs6ClientC15s.name: signingIdentity()
Classes/Client.html#/s:5MlsRs6ClientC15s.abstract: Get the signing identity for this client.

Classes/Client.html.name: Client
Classes/Client.html.abstract: An MLS client used to create key packages and manage groups.
